page.title: 11A Scunthorpe Child's Day
page.content: I am 11 years old. I wake up at a quarter to eight. For{breakfast}I have orange to drink, toast and cornflakes. I then get dressed and washed. With my pack-up in my school bag I walk to {school}or sometimes I'm taken in the car. School starts at 8.55 am. First it's{assembly}after which we get to work doing{Maths}until playtime and then{English}afterwards. { Dinnertime}is 12 o'clock. For dinner I have sandwiches, a drink, crisps and cake. Afternoon school starts at 1.25 pm. We have{art}or{craft}until playtime and after play we carry on until hometime which is quarter to four. When I get home I have{tea}and my best friend comes round. Together we make ghostbuster equipment like the things shown in the film. Sometimes we have a game of{football}or draw. I go to bed at 8.30 pm.
